patthana8.11:1.1_0: Narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:1.1_1: Narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:1.1_2: Narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī ca naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:2.1_0: Naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:2.1_1: Naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:2.1_2: Naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī ca naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:3.1_0: Narūpiñca naarūpiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:3.1_1: Narūpiñca naarūpiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:3.1_2: Narūpiñca naarūpiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī ca naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.11:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
